name: Ethereal Runner
description:
IMPORTANT: If the web version does not work for any reason, there is a downloadable windows version below.

Take control of TrashBag while you cross the ethereal plane in this infinity runner game.

The unstable layout of the espectral clouds and the aberrations that lie therein are to be your playground. 

Run, jump, dash, and crouch to navigate these lands; use your shield before the fires of the lost souls sear your flesh, expel the magic you gather to bring an explosive end to them!

(You can pause the game and see controls with the escape key)

Credits:

#GlassBrick Games: twitter

- GordotForrot (Coding / Music / Art): github / twitter 

 - GGGelo (Coding / Sounds): github / twitter 

 - narmuzz (Art / Monster Designer / Sounds / Testing):  github 

 - Pancho (Music / Sound Design / Testing): email

The downloaded windows version throws a security warning when attempting to open it. We're not sure why it does, but it's safe to ignore. If you're unsure about it, feel free to play the browser version instead, since there is no practical difference between the two.
